item.title: CVE-2024-35646|2024-06-04T17:34:20.207Z -- smartarget -- smartarget%20message%20bar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Smartarget Smartarget Message Bar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Smartarget Message Bar: from n/a through 1.3.
